evidence.claim: S&P Consultants utilizes AWS for cloud infrastructure and service deployment.
The company has expertise in FHIR and HL7 standards for healthcare data exchange.
Integration services utilizing Azure and Snowflake for data management and analysis.
They offer EDI services including transaction sets compliant with X12 standards.

icp.icp_reason: Focus on healthcare integration and X12 data exchange indicates ICP alignment.
